page.topic: How to Base a Grid on a Stored Procedure
page.description: The Grid component does not allow you to base a Grid on a stored procedure prior to V11. You must specify a SQL Select statement. You can however work around this limitation to a limited degree if your Grid is readonly.

case.description: Create a passive link table that is based on the stored procedure.
Create a grid using the native .dbf table (i.e. the passive link table)
In the Grid onGridInitialize event add code to refresh the passive link table.

section.example: dim tableName as c tableName = "PathAlias.ADB_Path\pir_report.dbf" pr =a5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable(tableName,.f.,.f.)
section.note: See Video #78 in the V10 Web videos(external link) for a better solution using V10.5 or above.
